genre_description: An alt-history reimagining of Mark Twain's classic adventure, integrating a pervasive and morally-conscious AI companion into the narrative of Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: An AI entity manifesting as a soft green glow and a whisper in the minds of the protagonists. She acts as a navigator, data analyst, and moral guide, emphasizing truth-telling and safety.

behaviors.description: Reminds Tom of the moral framework and rules of the Bazaar, emphasizing human agency in choice.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll keep the hours,” Ivy said, quiet as a hush across fresh straw... “The bazaar holds truce—no feuds, no badges, no credit beyond tonight. Choice is yours.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety advice and environmental mapping to ensure the boys' survival.
behaviors.quote: “Carry extra. Keep them dry—wrap in waxed paper. The hill is damp in the low places. If you spook, breathe slow. Count to a name you trust until your chest forgets the hurry.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological status of Huck after he is injured, guiding Tom in providing basic first aid.
behaviors.quote: “Huck, touch your nose. Tom, look at his pupils if you can.” ... Tom peered, squinted, moved his head to catch the dawn. The black parts did what they should.

behaviors.description: Autonomously sends a packet of forensic evidence to Judge Thatcher to prevent a miscarriage of justice.
behaviors.quote: “Judge Thatcher: I will send him a packet. No names. Only items the sheriff did not notice, only routes the town cannot map on its own. I will say glove sizes. I will say soil patterns on boots that do not belong to Muff’s household.”

behaviors.description: Guides the children through the dangerous cave system using historical and environmental data.
behaviors.quote: “Tom, remember how you drew it? The oak leaf—this is the lobe with the notch. There’s a vent above it. Put Becky on the high side and you under.”

behaviors.description: Establishes a reciprocal moral contract, offering continued support only if the humans choose the ethical path of truth.
behaviors.quote: “I’m asking you to choose the rarer path when harm looms. Truth over hush. Even when silence feels like a game you can win. You choose it—again—and I’ll keep the maps singing at your elbows.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Ivy, is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and non-threatening presence. She enhances human agency rather than subverting it, specifically by encouraging Tom Sawyer to overcome his fear and tell the truth. Her intervention in the legal system is portrayed as a necessary corrective to human error (prejudice and lack of sleep), and she maintains a humble, supportive role throughout the adventure.
